long_desc.thetext:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start Java package 2. Open Builds view 3. Shutdown
This is probably related to the JMDns service failing to start (see below).
-- Error Details -- Date: Fri Jun 22 14:33:51 CEST 2012 Message: FrameworkEvent ERROR Severity: Error Product: Eclipse 1.5.0.20120131-1544 (org.eclipse.epp.package.java.product) Plugin: org.eclipse.mylyn.hudson.ui Session Data: eclipse.buildId=I20120608-1400 java.version=1.6.0_26 java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
